channel.title: Merging SMF Forums
channel.description:
This question is more directed toward MITB.
Working with a Simple Machines Forum (SMF), I am rehabilitating and hosting a forum for another website. However, I plan on hosting my own forum in the future. I would like to merge the two forums together, meaning the forums would be different but use the same databases (like MITB, MSCP, GameDev, etc.).
Is maintaining merged forums difficult, especially when upgrading? What are the pros and cons of merging forums?
With warm regards,
TheCyberMan

item.title: Merging SMF Forums
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

(I don’t know shit about this stuff, but I’ll give it a try)
I’d imagine that the accounts are held in one database, so you would probably just have to edit the files so when someone registers, it saves it to that database, and when he logs in, it does so in the database… Doubt it would be too hard, just have to change all the stuff relating to members, like reputation, the moderation system, etc. Make sure to integrate the “Show new replies to your posts” button to display all the forums posts, I suggested this a while back, but nobody wanted to do it so it never happened.
